title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 60.4 - Losing mileage
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 60.4 - Losing mileage

State Regulations

If an odometer is made to run in reverse, while installed
in the vehicle, it must not allow more than 10 miles or kilometers to be lost
before it ceases to operate in reverse. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
60.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
